title: NEL service delayed due to power fault

updates.text: 13/10, 9.30am: Full NEL Svc is running. Free bus rides & shuttle buses have ceased. We are sorry.
13/10,9.25am:NEL Svc has resumed. Free bus rides & shuttle buses are still available. Pls expect some delays as trains are being regulated.
13/10, 9.02am: NEL Svc has resumed. However pls expect some delays as the trains are being regulated. Stns are still crowded.
13/10, 8.53am: Full NEL Svc is running. Free bus rides & shuttle buses are still available. We are sorry.
13/10, 8.33am: Full NEL Svc is running. Stations are still crowded & delays can be expected.
13/10, 8.33am: Full NEL Svc is running. Free bus rides & shuttle buses are still available. We are sorry.
13/10, 8.26am: NEL Svc has resumed btwn Farrer Pk NE8 & Hougang NE14. Full svc is now available on NEL. We are sorry.
13/10,8.06am: No NEL service btwn Farrer Pk NE8 & Hougang NE14. To continue your journey, free bus rides available at designated bus stops
No NEL service between Farrer Pk NE8 & Hougang NE14 due to power fault. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
13/10, 7.50am: NEL svc is delayed due to a power fault. Additional travel time of abt 15 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
